question: Can guys get BV? and if so how? and does it cure naturally on them?
question_content: I keep getting it for some reason and i have been sleeping with the same guy for almost 6 years, but sometimes i do get it and sometimes i don't so I wonder if guys can get it? and if its not from him what gives?!

answers.answer_content: My doctor says guys cannot get it and I've read online both opinions

Remember vaginosis is a PH balance issue. This can mean something that you're using is throwing off your balance. Soaps, bubble bath, lotion or even perfume. It is a good idea while trying to treat the symptoms to eliminate anything with a fragrance.Plain organic yogurt can restore some order; this can be applied directly to the source.

Guys dont have vaginas, but they CAN become contaminated and spread around certain bacteria.  Common hygiene after sex would keep the guy from carrying around such contaminants.

And for the record, general hygiene in itself does not prevent or cure basic STDs such as GC or Syphillis.

Do the math...BV stands for Bacterial "Vaginosis" as in "vagina".Do men have vaginas?No...BV is an imbalace with the good and bad bacteria in your vagina.It can be caused by douching or several sexual partners.
